containerVersion.name: POL-1275 GA4 IT 版本 追蹤事件列表

parameter.value:
<script>
// to be trigger as setup tag sequence for event tags
/*** CONFIGURATION ***/
  // Add the property keys that need to be flushed with each event
  var dataLayerPropertiesToFlush = [
    'content_name',
    'content_type',
    'content_views',
    'content_clicks',
    'engagement_type',
    'file_extension',
    'file_name',
    'involvment_type',
    'link_classes',
    'link_domain',
    'link_id',
    'list_name',
    'link_text',
    'link_url',
    'location',
    'location_id',
    'login_method',
    'nav_type',
    'nav_tree_text',
    'outbound',
    'percent_scrolled',
    'shipping_tier',
    'signup_location',
    'social_network',
    'time_started',
    'time_completed',
    'ecommerce'
    ];
  /*** END CONFIGURATION ***/

  var previousPartialEvents = [];
  function getPreviousPartialEvents(cursor) {
    if (dataLayer[cursor - 1] && !dataLayer[cursor - 1].hasOwnProperty('event')) {
      previousPartialEvents.push(dataLayer[cursor - 1]);
      getPreviousPartialEvents(cursor - 1);
    }
  }

  try {
    var gtm = window.google_tag_manager[{{Container ID}}];

    // Get the dataLayer array index for this event
    var eventIndex = dataLayer.indexOf(
      dataLayer
      	.filter(function(x) {
          return x['gtm.uniqueEventId'] == gtm.dataLayer.get('gtm.uniqueEventId');
        })[0]
    );

    // Get the event object
    var event = dataLayer[eventIndex];

    // Gather previously pushed non-event objects recursively
    getPreviousPartialEvents(eventIndex);

	// Append any missing properties from previous partial events
    if (previousPartialEvents.length > 0) {
      previousPartialEvents.forEach(function(prevEvent) {
        for (var prop in prevEvent) {
          if (!event.hasOwnProperty(prop)) {
            event[prop] = prevEvent[prop];
          }
        }
      });
    }

    // Flush all values except 'event' with dataLayer.set()
    dataLayerPropertiesToFlush.forEach(function(prop) {
      if (prop != 'event') {
        gtm.dataLayer.set(prop, undefined);
      }
    });

    // Reattach event properties to the dataLayer
    for (var prop in event) {
      if (prop !== 'event' && event.hasOwnProperty(prop)) {
        gtm.dataLayer.set(prop, event[prop]);
      }
    }
  } catch (e) {}
</script>
